entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Periods of snow beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
